Html:
hey, I'm new here and I can't even run the sample languages as I don't know how to!
I have the whatever.cs and included irony.dll in my project but I don't know what to do next as in how do I get the language to work. Could someone guide me step by step plz
thanks,
Gabe

there's no compilation - only parsing + interpreter. Just launch Grammar Explorer, load sample grammars, try parsing samples, see how it's done inside GE main form
Roman
